title: REFINED LIVING IN OUR LUXURY APARTMENTS IN HOUSTON HEIGHTS
posting_body: ['For leasing info call or text', 'show contact info', 'today!', 'Ask about ID#247292', 'Welcome to this community, a brand-new community of luxury apartments in Houston, TX.', 'Located just minutes from Downtown and Houston’s Farmers Market, you’ll find yourself nestled in the city’s most charming neighborhood.', 'With beautiful tree-lined streets and preserved brick buildings that are reminiscent of the past, this historic Houston Heights neighborhood has long-established roots that highlights true Texas spirit.', 'The residential experience is curated with contemporary style and personalized conveniences.', 'The meticulously designed interiors, exceptional amenities, and unbeatable views of the Downtown Houston skyline define this iconic collection of luxury apartment homes.', 'Live at this community and experience the perfect balance between class, convenience, and comfort.', 'Community Features:', '2020 Design Ovation Award Winning Clubhouse with Catering Kitchen and Dining Room', 'Over 1.5 Acres of Open Green Space in Two Large Courtyards', 'Luxury Pool with Sunning Deck', '24-Hour Athletic Gym featuring Spin Bikes, Cardio Machines, Free Weights, Strength Training Equipment and On-Site Fitness Classes', 'Large Dog Park', 'Air-Conditioned Corridors', 'Private Business Conference Room with PCs and Wireless Printing', 'Outdoor Summer Kitchen with Barbecue Grills', 'Trellis with Seating Areas', 'Outdoor Gaming Area', '24/7 Parcel Lockers', 'Wi-Fi Hotspots', 'Gated Community', 'Controlled Access', 'Electrical Car Charging Stations', 'Green Energy Community', '24/7 Emergency Maintenance', 'Smoke Free Community']
